actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require the Federal Government to assume all costs relating to implementation of and compliance with that Act.

summary.text: Endangered Species Funding Act - Requires the Secretary of the Interior or the Secretary of Commerce, as appropriate, to deposit into the Cooperative Endangered Species Fund of the Treasury all amounts necessary to implement and comply with the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require the Federal Government to assume all costs relating to implementation of and compliance with that Act.
